root: ^Yeah, this is the place. Nobody around, what could be here that needs my help? This place couldn't be helped by House Holly on a good day.
^Hey did you get to the place? Find anything yet?
^Yeah, I found the place easy enough.
^Big warehouse, though looks as empty as the street that I had to take to get here. Find anything interesting about it with your research?
^Nothing yet. Built a few decades back, and hasn't seen commercial use in at least a few years. Now it's only used by the local kids and strays.
^If this is another stolen cat I am going to explode.
^Don't worry, I checked the Zodiac board first thing after you left. Nobody has posted about missing pets recently.
^Still leaves the question of why that letter came in. Stay on the line, I'm going to check out the inside.
^Sure, keep me posted on any updates.
^Nothing here, I think we just got a prank call out here.
^You are a selfless fool, yet I envy your audacity.
^You know the inevitability of a house war. Yet despite this knowledge you have chosen not to aid, but to stay away.
^You allow the world to crumble, the houses to be destroyed, then you are in charge of the world.
^No damage comes to you, yet the rest of us have to die.
^It is not right that the rest of us be punished for your absence. That's why you have to die instead.
^In that case, I'll grant you a premature death.
